A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was my last trip ever to see the Star Wars new part of this series. Enough of recycling\, repetition\, and rehashing. It is much more pleasure and entertainment to watch a good old Empire Strikes Back one more time rather than go over the same and predictable scenario. There is always a vital spot in a spaceship\, there is always a traitor\, there is always a bad leader\, and same old hope... This time the hope that this franchise can surprise with refreshing movie script has finally died ...
